title: Film appreciation: nature of the film medium
creator_credit: OFM Productions, Karl Holtsnider, Simon Scanlon and Bruce Baker
brief_description: Demonstrates the flexibility of film presentation, the uses of variation in camera speed, camera movement and angle, subjective camera and symbolic techniques, illustrated by extracts. Features Ruth Hussey.
